customize.name: Fatui
customize.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

customize.text: Katarina Snezhevna grew up in the House of the Hearth that belongs to the Fatui. She was a member of the Ninth Company that was sent to

customize.name: The Chasm
customize.desc: As the saying goes, "The layered cliffs cast elusive shadows, to where treacherous roads lead, no one knows." In the ancient texts of Liyue, this place is sometimes referred to as the "Yu Valley." Even the radiant brilliance of the sun must sink into the deep shadows of dusk. Although legends remain mere legends, one should always expect the unexpected when exploring this labyrinthine underground mineshaft.

customize.text: by Liyue authorities to investigate the anomaly in the mines. After the incident with a Fatui Harbinger

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: The Eleventh of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as Childe. His real name is Ajax.

customize.name: Osial
customize.desc: Overlord of the Vortex, who was defeated by Rex Lapis during the Archon War.

customize.text: , all Fatui were announced traitors, and all communication with them was cut off.

customize.name: Pulcinella
customize.desc: The Fifth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as The Rooster. He is a mayor of Snezhnaya.

customize.text: had given up relatively low-value assets for more significant endeavors, and the Ninth Company was abandoned in The Chasm.

customize.name: Anton
customize.desc: Anton Melnikov is the Staff Sergeant of the Ninth Company.

customize.text:
Ninth Company Brevet Commander
Nikolay
Corporal of the Ninth Company and Katarina's younger brother. When he disappeared in The Chasm, Katarina left her company to search for him.

customize.name: Lyudochka Snezhevna
customize.desc: A former Fatuus who started a new life in Inazuma.

customize.text: Katarina's friend from the House of the Hearth.

customize.name: Corporal Nikolay's Diary
customize.desc: A fragment of Fatui Corporal Nikolay's diary. It gives off a rather unpleasant smell, but that's at least better than being covered in mud.

customize.name: Corporal Nikolay's Diary
customize.desc: A letter left behind by Corporal Nikolay. Its contents have long ceased to be whole.
